name: Market Trader Training | Investing in Stocks | Options | FOREX | Commodities| Investor
description: The objective of the Market Trader Training program is to teach students to trade safely and profitably. The instructors are not brokers, will not conduct trades, recommend stocks or futures for you, hold your money and don’t receive commissions. Jim only wants to teach you how to trade successfully.
